name: @vitejs/plugin-vue

1.0.0.name: @vitejs/plugin-vue

scripts.build-types: tsc -p . --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir temp && api-extractor run && rimraf temp

1.0.0.description: Note: requires `@vue/compiler-sfc` as peer dependency. This is largely a port of `rollup-plugin-vue` with some vite-specific tweaks.
